name: Davidoff - Piquant - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Davidoff Piquant is a full-strength cigar that is handmade in the Dominican Republic. Its reddish Ecuadorian Habano wrapper is draped over an Ecuadorian Sumatra-seed binder and a Nicaraguan filler. The Davidoff Piquant is available in two vitolas: gordo and robusto. It is sold in select stores and can be purchased as singles or in bundles of 10.
